item.title: clojure.xml忽略DTD验证
item.description: 问题 在通过clojure生成mybatis mapper文件的过程中，发现启动过程缓慢，原因是会验证xml的schema，因此解决方法就是屏蔽掉DTD的验证 clojure.xml API没有DTD写入解决: (defn emit-xml "Prints the given Element tree as XML text to stream. Options: :encoding <str> Character encoding to use" [e & {:as opts}] (let [stream (StringWriter.) ^XMLStreamWriter writer (-> (XMLOutputFactory/newInstance) (.createXMLStreamWriter stream))] (when (instance? OutputStreamWriter stream) (check-stream-encoding stream (or (:encoding opts) "UTF-8"))) (.writeStartDocument writer (or (:encoding opts) "UTF-8") "1.0") (.writeDTD writer "<!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC \"-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN\" \"http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd\">") (doseq [event (flatten-elements [e])] (emit-event event writer)) (.
